mapper.sql: did, dname, dnumber, dphone, didCard, ddage, dstatus, remark1, remark2, remark3, remark4, remark5
mapper.select:
select
from driver
dname like CONCAT('%',#{dname},'%' )
dphone like CONCAT('%',#{dphone},'%')
dstatus=#{dstatus}

select * from driver
dname like CONCAT('%',#{dname},'%' )
dphone like CONCAT('%',#{dphone},'%')
dstatus=#{dstatus}
mapper.insert: insert into driver (did, dname, dnumber, dphone, didCard, ddage, dstatus, remark1, remark2, remark3, remark4, remark5) values (#{did,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{didcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ddage,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},'备用', '备用', '备用', '备用', '备用')

did,

mapper.update:
update driver
dname = #{dname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dnumber = #{dnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dphone = #{dphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
didCard = #{didcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ddage = #{ddage,jdbcType=INTEGER},
dstatus = #{dstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},

remark2 = #{remark2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark3 = #{remark3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark4 = #{remark4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark5 = #{remark5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where did = #{did,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update driver set dname = #{dname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dnumber = #{dnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dphone = #{dphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, didCard = #{didcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ddage = #{ddage,jdbcType=INTEGER}, dstatus = #{dstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark1 = #{remark1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark2 = #{remark2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark3 = #{remark3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark4 = #{remark4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark5 = #{remark5,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where did = #{did,jdbcType=INTEGER}
